FuncDef: This command clears Bridged Residential Gateway (BRG) data.
CLIs: gateway all-gatewaysgateway brg-id <brg-ident> all-hostsgateway brg-id <brg-ident> host <ieee-address>

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the string that represents the identifier of a Bridged Residential Gateway.
Clears data for idle bindings only.
Specifies a binding address for which to clear data.
Specifies a host address for which to clear data.
